data.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Swamp Thing™
data.detailed_description:
If you're a racing monster and a natural on the track, no car will embody your driving style like Swamp Thing™. Its hood and intake look like the monstrous face of the famous DC character, half man and half plant entity from the swamps.
With this racing car made of speed and strength, getting on the podium will be as easy as one-two… tree. Excellent off road but perfect in any environment, those who think they can beat it are way off.

Green thumbs-up for HOT WHEELS™ - Swamp Thing™: an evergreen in any self-respecting collection!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3
data.about_the_game:
If you're a racing monster and a natural on the track, no car will embody your driving style like Swamp Thing™. Its hood and intake look like the monstrous face of the famous DC character, half man and half plant entity from the swamps.
With this racing car made of speed and strength, getting on the podium will be as easy as one-two… tree. Excellent off road but perfect in any environment, those who think they can beat it are way off.

Green thumbs-up for HOT WHEELS™ - Swamp Thing™: an evergreen in any self-respecting collection!

data.short_description: Inspired by DC's plant monster, here's a high-speed, rugged racing car ready to put down roots on the top step of the podium! Green thumbs-up for HOT WHEELS™ - Swamp Thing™: an evergreen in any self-respecting collection!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
